ComicInfo.Summary:
GRIMM FURRY TALES
Wiglaf is a bit... different than the other students. However, when he does a spell to appear as human, he quickly discovers that everyone else in the school has gotten a little furry. In the craziest issue of Grimm Fairy Tales yet, Wiglaf learns the oldest lesson in the book: be careful what you wish for.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ed Anderson | 1 | B | Cover B | Miguel Mendonca & Ylenia DiNapoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Paul Green | 3 |
